potionbrewer:DiseasePower.NAME: Disease
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage is reduced by half. At the end of turn, deal #b

potionbrewer:InfectionPower.NAME: Infection
DESCRIPTIONS: Doubles each turn. When Infection reaches #b
applies #b1 Disease, and is reduced by #b

potionbrewer:ToxicPower.NAME: Toxic
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of each turn, lose

potionbrewer:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b
